statements: UPDATE content_engagement_metrics SET likes = 50, shares = 20 WHERE content_id = 1;

UPDATE content_engagement_metrics SET likes = likes + 1, comments = comments + 2 WHERE content_id = 1;
UPDATE content_engagement_metrics SET shares = shares + 1, likes = likes + 2 WHERE content_id = 2;
